alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foothills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 06 at 8:10PM MST until December 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The Central Black Hills and the Southern Black Hills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The high winds may damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foothills; Southern Black Hills
